Class Hierarchy

  • object: The most base type
    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • EasyExtend.util.hexobject.NotConvertibleException
        • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.langlet.SpecialElement
        • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions that do not represent interpreter exiting.
          • exceptions.AttributeError: Attribute not found.
            • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DAccessError
        • exceptions.Warning: Base class for warning categories.
          • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dutils.TagIsKeywordWarning
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.xmlutils.BeautifulSoupParser
    • EasyExtend.eeoptions.EEShow: EEShow is an abstract base class.
      • EasyExtend.eetokenizer.BaseTokenizer: Abstract base class of Tokenizer classes.
        • EasyExtend.eetokenizer.Tokenizer
          • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.langlet.LangletTokenizer: Defines langlet specific token stream processor.
    • EasyExtend.util.Enum.Enum
      • EasyExtend.util.hexobject.PAD_MODE

      • EasyExtend.util.hexobject.Hex: Generic hexadecimal object.
    • EasyExtend.eeimporter.Importer
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.langlet.LangletImporter: Defines langlet specific import behaviour.
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4D: P4D objects are lazy wrappers around nested lists that store XML or P4D data.
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.bytelet.Bytelet: Bytelets are flexible data structures used for binary serialization.
        • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.bytelet.ByteletSchema
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DNamespace
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DNode: Used to build list-trees from the bottom up.
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.xmlutils.Parser
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.xmlutils.ExpatParser
    • EasyExtend.eetransformer.Transformer
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.langlet.LangletTransformer: Defines langlet specific CST transformations.
        • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.langlet.InteractiveTransformer
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase._child_iter
    • basestring: Type basestring cannot be instantiated; it is the base for str and unicode.
      • str: str(object) -> string
        • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DName
    • dict: dict() -> new empty dictionary.
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DAttributes
    • int: int(x[, base]) -> integer
      • EasyExtend.util.hexobject.Bin
    • list: list() -> new list list(sequence) -> new list initialized from sequence's items
      • EasyExtend.util.hexobject.Bits
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dbase.P4DList: Class used to represent lists of P4D objects.
        • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.bytelet.ByteletList: Class used to represent lists of P4D objects.
    • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dutils.pprinter
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.p4dutils.p4dprinter
      • EasyExtend.langlets.p4d.xmlutils.xmlprinter
    • type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
      • EasyExtend.util.Enum.EnumMetaclass: Metaclass for enumeration.
